name: Sim Power button
Sim RF off
reset alarm
func:
msg.payload = { value: 0, 'fc': 0x6, 'unitid': 1, 'address': 4 , 'quantity': 1 } ;
return msg;

name: reset all
func:
msg.payload = { value: 0, 'fc': 0x6, 'unitid': 1, 'address': 5 , 'quantity': 1 } ;
return msg;

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/bootstrap.css"/>
